comments: Sum( k>=0, b(k) ) = Pi was the first BBP formula for Pi (Bayley-Borwein-Plouffe in 1995). Allows one to extract any specified binary digit of Pi.
formula: sum( k>=0, b(k) ) = Pia(n)=numerator((1/16)^n*sum(i=1,4,((-1)^(ceil(4/(2*i))))*(floor(4/i))/(8*n+i+floor(sqrt(i-1))*(floor(sqrt(i-1))+1)))) [From _Alexander R. Povolotsky_, Aug 31 2009]
author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Aug 13 2002
